name: mstps

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c0, cxms))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, cxms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c0, ctps))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ *MetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ *MetSp → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, cxms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ *MetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ *MetSp → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c0, ctps))

comment: A metric space is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
